description: Plugin for integrating data with NCR

ProvUsername.title: Username
ProvUsername.description: NCR tenant username - required for credentials auth

ProvPassword.title: Password
ProvPassword.description: NCR tenant password - required for credentials auth

Secret Key.title: Secret Key
Secret Key.description: Secret access key generated by NCR tenant - required for access key auth

Shared Key.title: Shared Key
Shared Key.description: Shared access key generated by NCR tenant - required for access key auth

NepApplicationKey.title: NEP Application Key
NepApplicationKey.description: Application key found within NCR documentation

QueryStartDate.title: Query Start Date
QueryStartDate.description: The date to be used as the starting point for historical data. Do not add T00:00:00Z as instructed by API. Format examples: yyyy-MM-dd or "1993-05-10"

QueryEndDate.title: Query End Date
QueryEndDate.description: The date to be used as the finish point for historical data. If left blank, will run to the current day of each job going forward. Do not add T00:00:00Z as instructed by API. Format examples: yyyy-MM-dd or "1993-05-10"

SiteIDs.title: Site IDs
SiteIDs.description: Use CSV format. Format examples: "#,#" or "2315, 2304, 2430"
